snippet: The Giants’ quarterbacks, primarily Eli Manning, consume a larger portion of their team’s salary cap than any other quarterbacks in the N.F.L. The chart shows the percentage of the $123 million cap used by each team for its quarterbacks.
lead_paragraph: The Giants’ quarterbacks, primarily Eli Manning, consume a larger portion of their team’s salary cap than any other quarterbacks in the N.F.L. The chart shows the percentage of the $123 million cap used by each team for its quarterbacks.
